菶菶菶

菶字的基本解释

菶
běng
〔菶菶〕草木茂盛的样子。
姓。

菶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［běng］
［《廣韻》蒲蠓切，上董，並。］
［《廣韻》邊孔切，上董，幫。］
草盛貌。

菶字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　菶； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1040第06
【唐韻】邊孔切，音琫。【說文】草盛貌。【博雅】菶菶，茂也。【詩·大雅】菶菶萋萋。【疏】梧桐之貌也。　又【玉篇】多實也。　又【韻會】蒲蒙切，音蓬。義同。　又【集韻】同?。

菶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
菶字的起名意思

指草木茂盛的样子，如菶菶。

Calamus
Basic explanation of words
Calamus
běng
〔菶菶〕The appearance of lush vegetation.
name.
Calamus
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［běng］
["Guangyun" Pu Ling cut, go to Dong, and merge. ]
["Guangyun" side hole cut, go to Dong, help. ]
The grass is magnificent.
Calamus
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　菶; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1040 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Edge-hole cut, sound 琫. 【Said the text】The grass is full of appearance. [Bo Ya] Caulis calamus, Mao Ye. 【Poetry·Daya】Fish. 【Sparse】The appearance of the Chinese phoenix tree.　[Jade articles] It's more real.　[Yunhui] Pu Mengqie, Yinpeng. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The same?
Calamus

Name meaning
Refers to the appearance of lush vegetation, such as calamus.
běng, péng
